mapper.select: SELECT C.COMMENT_ID, C.PORTFOLIO_ID, C.USER_ID, C.CONTENT, C.REGDATE, C.MODDATE, C.COMMENT_PARENT_ID, COALESCE(CL.LIKECOUNT, 0) AS LIKECOUNT, (CASE WHEN CLU.USER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ISLIKED, U.NICKNAME FROM COMMENT C LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COMMENT_ID, COUNT(*) AS LIKECOUNT FROM COMMENT_LIKE GROUP BY COMMENT_ID ) CL ON C.COMMENT_ID = CL.COMMENT_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COMMENT_ID, USER_ID FROM COMMENT_LIKE WHERE USER_ID = #{loginUser.user_id} ) CLU ON C.COMMENT_ID = CLU.COMMENT_ID JOIN USER U ON C.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE C.PORTFOLIO_ID = #{portfolio.portfolio_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT( PORTFOLIO_ID, CONTENT, USER_ID, COMMENT_PARENT_ID ) VALUES ( #{portfolio_id}, #{content}, #{user_id}, #{comment_parent_id} )
